ComicInfo.Summary:
On the run from the law and people who want him dead, Kirk Best has no options but to take along FBI agent Lauren Sumner because of a device on his wrist that will detonate if they separate more than a hundred yards. Best delves deeper into the dark conspiracy of the Vice President's assassination, while the mysterious and powerful Hiroshi Katsura places a $5 million bounty on Best.
